overview: Janet Allison witnesses Art Holden and his gang hold up the Station Agent. When she identifies Holden to the Sheriff, the Sheriff gives Holden an alibi. Janet and Jim Fentriss then find Holden's secret hideout. When Janet returns the next day to meet Jim, Holden makes her a prisoner and waits in ambush for Jim to arrive.
tagline: HE WOULDN'T FIGHT...when a woman was with him!...But start something when he was alone and -- oh, Mister!
title: Silver Spurs
